entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to wet snow this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
